sentences: Täiskasvanud inimesele piisab päevas seitsmest grammist soolast.
Millal sa küll ükskord täiskasvanuks saad?
context: The word 'täiskasvanud' is an adjective in Estonian that means adult or grown-up. It's formed from the components 'täis' (meaning full) and 'kasvanud' (meaning grown). As an adjective, it can be used to describe people who have reached adulthood, as in 'täiskasvanud mees' (adult man). The word can also function as a substantive when referring to adults collectively. It has comparative form 'täiskasvanum' and superlative form 'kõige täiskasvanum', indicating more adult/most adult respectively.
